alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:36PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central and northern Denver, and northwestern Adams Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 435 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Denver, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Denver, southeastern Thornton, Commerce City, eastern Northglenn, Brighton, Federal Heights, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Barr Lake and Todd Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
